pages.text: $(2)When you first step into this world you might notice that some stuff doesn't match your vanilla Minecraft experience.$()For example, you can't chop trees with bare hands. To make a crafting table, you need to do these stuff:$(li)$(9)Right click$() tall grass on the ground with empty hand to get $(2)Plant Fiber$(7) (There's a chance to drop)$();

$(li)$(9)Right click$() tiny rocks scattered around the surface with enpty hands to get $(5)Pebbles$();$(li)Break tree leaves with $(9)bare hands$() to get $(6)wooden sticks$();$(li)Use everything you get so far to make a $(9)Crude Hatchet$(), then you can chop trees with it!

pages.text: $(br)$(2)Note: if you can't find rocks, try to find it near cave entrances, where there will usually be a lot.$()$(br)Rocks have many variants like Granite Rocks, Diorite Rocks, etc and they all give you pebble.$()$(br)The next page lists crafting recipes you will need. $(5)Note: these are shapeless recipes and just put all of the ingredients in the 2*2 crafting grid in your inventory.$()
